abstract: David W Dunlap Building Blocks column notes that Max Spivak mural, rediscovered during construction of 5 Bryant Park office tower, has once again been covered up, this time for protection as building continues; examines mural's details and history.
lead_paragraph: An exuberant mosaic mural by Max Spivak was uncovered during a renovation at a Manhattan building, but large plastic sheets have been erected in front of it, once again hiding it from passers-by.

headline.main: A Brief Resurrection for a Mural Recalling the Garment Industry’s Heyday
headline.print_headline: Brief Resurrection for a Mural Recalling the Garment Industry’s Heyday

snippet: An exuberant mosaic mural by Max Spivak was uncovered during a renovation at a Manhattan building, but large plastic sheets have been erected in front of it, once again hiding it from passers-by.
